name: minimap2

options.description: split index for every ~NUM input bases [4G]
filter out top FLOAT fraction of repetitive minimizers [0.0002]
stop chain enlongation if there are no minimizers in INT-bp [5000]
max fragment length (effective with -xsr or in the fragment mode) [800]
minimal number of minimizers on a chain [3]
minimal chaining score (matching bases minus log gap penalty) [40]
skip self and dual mappings (for the all-vs-all mode)
retain at most INT secondary alignments [5]
gap extension penalty; a k-long gap costs min{O1+k*E1,O2+k*E2} [2,1]
Z-drop score and inversion Z-drop score [400,200]
how to find GT-AG. f:transcript strand, b:both strands, n:don't match GT-AG [n]
output in the SAM format (PAF by default)
write CIGAR with >65535 ops at the CG tag
SAM read group line in a format like '@RG\tID:foo\tSM:bar' []
output the cs tag; STR is 'short' (if absent) or 'long' [none]
use soft clipping for supplementary alignments

preset (always applied before other options; see minimap2.1 for details) [] - map-pb/map-ont - PacBio CLR/Nanopore vs reference mapping - map-hifi - PacBio HiFi reads vs reference mapping - ava-pb/ava-ont - PacBio/Nanopore read overlap - asm5/asm10/asm20 - asm-to-ref mapping, for ~0.1/1/5% sequence divergence - splice/splice:hq - long-read/Pacbio-CCS spliced alignment - sr - genomic short-read mapping

tldr:
> Map and align between collections of DNA sequences.
> More information: <https://lh3.github.io/minimap2/>.

- Get alignment in SAM format

`minimap2 -a {{ref.fa}} {{query.fq}} > {{alignment.sam}}`

- Map long noisy genomic reads (PacBio):

`minimap2 -ax map-pb {{ref.fa}} {{pacbio-reads.fq}} > {{aln.sam}}`

- Map long cDNA-seq reads (Oxford Nanopore):

`minimap2 -ax splice {{ref.fa}} {{nanopore-cdna.fa}} > {{aln.sam}}`

- Find overlaps between long reads (Oxford Nanopore):

`minimap2 -x ava-ont {{reads.fq}} {{reads.fq}} > {{ovlp.paf}}`

- Map short accurate paired-end genomic reads:

`minimap2 -ax sr {{ref.fa}} {{read1.fq}} {{read2.fq}} > s{{aln.sam}}`

- Full genome/assembly alignment:

`minimap2 -ax asm5 {{ref.fa}} {{asm.fa}} > {{aln.sam}}`
